name: Let Me Be Chaos!
description:
Jeffrey Wallace is a bit of an edgelord, and he wants to change his name to “Chaos” because then he’ll finally be able to embody the chaos that, like, totally affects our lives on a daily basis. The final dungeon on his quest to become a true edgelord lies in the keeps of the Pinnacle of ORDER itself, the DMV. Also, he's only 16 and his parents do not approve of this. But he's determined to make it happen, or his name isn’t CHAOS!

Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD Keys : Movement

Space Bar : Accept/Interact

M Key : Adjust Headphones (music volume)

I hope you enjoy!

Game Created by David Black for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Dialogic Plugin: Emilio Coppola et al; dialogic.coppolaemilio.com

Music: Eric Skiff - Hhavok (intro) and Hhavok (main) - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

Font: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/metropolitano
